scripts.build: npm run compile && node --enable-source-maps out/build.js && rm -r out
scripts.deploy:dev: export AWS_PROFILE=md-to-site && npx serverless deploy --verbose --stage dev --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=md-to-site" --param="bucketId=1"
scripts.remove:dev: export AWS_PROFILE=md-to-site && npx serverless remove --stage dev --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=md-to-site" --param="bucketId=1"
scripts.deploy:prod: export AWS_PROFILE=md-to-site && npx serverless deploy --verbose --stage prod --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=md-to-site" --param="bucketId=1"
scripts.remove:prod: export AWS_PROFILE=md-to-site && npx serverless remove --stage prod --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=md-to-site" --param="bucketId=1"
scripts.info:dev: export AWS_PROFILE=md-to-site && npx serverless info --verbose --stage dev --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=md-to-site" --param="bucketId=1"
scripts.info:prod: export AWS_PROFILE=md-to-site && npx serverless info --verbose --stage prod --region ap-southeast-2 --param="profile=md-to-site" --param="bucketId=1"
